thread.title_full: Peloton Appoints Patricia Campano to Lead Financial Consolidation and Reporting Practice

author: Raymond Nieuwenhuizen
title: Peloton Appoints Patricia Campano to Lead Financial Consolidation and Reporting Practice
text:
Peloton, a nationally recognized leader in Business Analytics, Enterprise Performance Management and Cloud Solutions, today announced that Patricia Campano has joined Peloton as the Financial Consolidation and Reporting Practice Lead. In this role, Patricia will be responsible for the continued expansion of Peloton’s national practice focused on transforming the financial close, consolidation, and reporting processes for its portfolio of enterprise and upper mid-market clients. "Patricia is a proven expert and adept at leading teams and large scale programs focusing on the financial close and consolidation process while also driving best practices to maximize our clients’ internal and external reporting processes," said Guy Daniello, CEO and Founder of Peloton.
“Business leaders are embracing the value and insights that a strong accounting and financial data foundation provides. They are selecting proven technology to improve financial and operational processes required to drive and support business growth,” continued Guy Daniello. “Patricia is a proven expert and skilled at leading teams as well as large scale programs focusing on financial reporting, close and consolidations.”
Patricia Campano brings over 20 years of experience and has successfully delivered hundreds of complex client engagements – leveraging process and technology-based solutions – to improve efficiency and effectiveness of the close, consolidation, and financial reporting processes. In her leadership role at Peloton, Patricia will also assist organizations to assess Sarbanes-Oxley, taxation, corporate re-organization, SEC reporting, and Merger and Acquisition related reporting solutions and alternatives.
“It is truly exciting to be part of an organization that has best practice process expertise and deep technology leadership across the full Enterprise Performance Management suite. The practice has the capabilities to not only improve an organization’s financial reporting and close processes, but to transform them, driving value over the long term,” adds Patricia Campano.
About Peloton
Peloton is a nationally recognized leader in Business Analytics, Enterprise Performance Management, and Cloud Solutions. Our Advisory, Implementation, and Outsourced Services drive business transformation in the areas of Business Analytics, Business Planning, Consolidations and Financial Reporting, Technology Infrastructure, and Cloud Solutions.
Peloton Business and Technology professionals provide unique perspective, proven experience and leverage an innovative and collaborative approach to achieve results for our clients. At Peloton, we are committed to helping organizations leverage leading practices to Achieve Optimal Performance!
Inc. 5000 recognizes Peloton as one of America’s fastest growing private companies. Peloton is an Oracle Platinum Partner.
